medium: Color screenprint, lithograph, and gold radiance powder
title: Angel and Boy
marks: Signed, dated, numbered, chop mark LR: [Nicolas Africano 86]
description: Two nude figures; a boy on L and a celestial figure in a halo on R; boy is crouched over; his body illuminated by a haze of bright color; predominant colors: green, cream, gold
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
